description: Fundamental commands and dojang etiquette for white belt

terms.definition: Ready position with feet together and body straight
terms.notes: Basic starting position for all techniques

terms.definition: Formal bow showing respect to instructor or partner
terms.notes: Essential etiquette - bow when entering/leaving dojang

terms.definition: Command to start practice or technique
terms.notes: Used by instructor to begin training

terms.definition: Command to stop or finish practice
terms.notes: Important for safety - stop immediately when heard

terms.definition: The way of hand and foot - Korean martial art
terms.notes: Tae = foot, Kwon = hand, Do = way/path

terms.definition: Training hall or martial arts school
terms.notes: Place where martial arts are practiced
